import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const SurfingScores = (player, index, score) => { if (surf) { const surferScores =
handleTouchStart(index)} onTouchEnd={handleTouchEnd}>
selectJersey(index)}>
{(isTieScore(index, score) && (index !== 0)) ? index : (index + 1)} {rank[(isTieScore(index, score) && (index !== 0)) ? index : (index > 2) ? 3 : (index)]}
{(player.player || player.name).split(' ')[0]}
{(player.player || player.name).split(' ')[1]}
{score}
{rankStatus(player, index, score)}
{(state.editIndex === index && state.showButtons) ? editSurfer(index) : null}
{players[index].surfScores.map((score, wave) => getWave(index, wave, players[index].surfScores[wave]))}
return surferScores } return } export default SurfingScores;
